name: Shark Bait (mikomoares, roguetaver)
description:
Description

This is a super fun and Chaotic local co-op game, you and your friend take control of two pirates and have to maintain their balance on a plank.

If you two don't want to be shark bait, you guys better work together, but be careful, objects and enemies are gonna keep falling from the sky!

Controls

A, D - MOVE (green pirate)

Left, right - MOVE (red pirate)

Made by:

roguetaver

mikomoares
